thread.title: Apple Stock Drops As Keynote Fails To Impress And Restore Confidence
thread.title_full: Apple Stock Drops As Keynote Fails To Impress And Restore Confidence

title: Apple Stock Drops As Keynote Fails To Impress And Restore Confidence
text: September 10, 2015 at 09:52 AM EDT Apple Stock Drops As Keynote Fails To Impress And Restore Confidence It used to be standard protocol to buy Apple stock in the weeks leading up to an iPhone announcement and then sell it after the announcement. Anyone who tried it this year will have been sorely disappointed.
